text: Ronaldo Camará (born 5 January 2003) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Benfica B in Liga Portugal 2. ==Professional career== On 10 January 2019, Camará signed his first professional contract with Benfica. Camará made his professional debut with Benfica B in a 2-0 LigaPro win over C.D. Cova da Piedade on 16 February 2020. ==International career== Born in Guinea-Bissau, Camará is a youth international for Portugal. ==Honours== Benfica * UEFA Youth League runner-up: 2019–20 ==References== ==External links== * * * FPF Profile Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Bissau Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Portugal youth international footballers Category:Bissau-Guinean footballers Category:Portuguese people of Bissau-Guinean descent Category:Bissau-Guinean emigrants to Portugal Category:Association football midfielders Category:S.L. Benfica B players Category:LigaPro players
title: Ronaldo Camará
